column5: Another deadline met by the skin of my teeth.  This one going to the museum tomorrow morning for the month of Dec.  They will photograph it there for me, for the people waiting for prints.  "Midnight Bandits" 16 x 20 acrylic on canvas with trompe loeil (fool the eye) painted window frame edge.    Pam
Very Nice Painting Pam.         Those guys are so easy to like when they are in someone else's backyard.  Tom
"Midnight Bandits" appropriate title, looks good, well done...
You really captured their "look of guilt," Pamela!!!  Awesome!
Another of Pam's masterpieces.  Looks great.  My artistic talents are limited to drawing stick figures.

Thanks everyone, I took it in to the museum today and the director of the museum thought it was in a frame! LOL  It's painted to look like a window frame with a handle.  The triptych landscape "Rushing Waters" won't be in the show but they absolutely loved it.  Made me feel good anyway.  Pam
Ever thought of taking up painting as a hobby Pam  Super work as per usual!
They get better with each painting Pam. Your style is unique. Like the others, I give it two thumbs up!!
